posts.post_title: Looking to trade for another OJ
posts.post_content:
Posted By: John S
I have an extra OJ, Crowell of Cleveland.  The card is slightly faded and has a pinhole in the bottom portion.  I would like to trade for another OJ.  Shoot me an email if interested.
